day1.text: Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
Say, 'He is Allah, [who is] One.'
Indeed, Allah loves those who repent.
My Mercy encompasses all things.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor].
And upon Allah let the believers rely.
Every soul will taste death.
Establish prayer and give zakah and obey the Messenger.
Indeed, Allah loves those who do good.
There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.
And turn to Allah in repentance, all of you, O believers.
Despair not of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins.
So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
And whoever relies upon Allah – then He is sufficient for him.
And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
And enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong.
Indeed, Allah loves those who purify themselves.
Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him.
Ask forgiveness of your Lord and then repent to Him.
Your Lord is the possessor of mercy.
And few of My servants are grateful.
Put your trust in the Ever-Living who does not die.
So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
And remember your Lord much and exalt [Him] with praise in the evening and the morning.
Indeed, Allah loves the righteous.
And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him.
And whoever does evil or wrongs himself but then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
Indeed, My mercy prevails over My wrath.
Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
And fear a Day when you will be returned to Allah.
So race to [all that is] good.
Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Allah – there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
Our Lord, forgive us and have mercy upon us.
And My Mercy encompasses all things.
Say, 'All praise is [due] to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion.'
And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer... We will not let the reward of the righteous go to waste.

Your Lord is the possessor of mercy.
And few of My servants are grateful.
Put your trust in the Ever-Living who does not die.
So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it.
And remember your Lord much and exalt [Him] with praise in the evening and the morning.
Indeed, Allah loves the righteous.
And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him.
And whoever does evil or wrongs himself but then seeks forgiveness of Allah will find Allah Forgiving and Merciful.
Indeed, My mercy prevails over My wrath.
Then eat of what Allah has provided for you [which is] lawful and good. And be grateful for the favor of Allah.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
And fear a Day when you will be returned to Allah.
So race to [all that is] good.
Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Allah – there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
Our Lord, forgive us and have mercy upon us.
And My Mercy encompasses all things.
Say, 'All praise is [due] to Allah, who has not taken a son and has had no partner in [His] dominion.'
And rely upon Allah; and sufficient is Allah as Disposer of affairs.
That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
Indeed, those who recite the Book of Allah and establish prayer... We will not let the reward of the righteous go to waste.
